name: Yachu Dice
description:
Yachu Dice!


Yachu is a simplified version of the classic Yahtzee dice game with clean UI
supporting "Local Multiplayer"

Roll the dice, score high and beat your friends!
You can play with friends up to 4 players

Yachu currently features:
-high scores
-number of Yachts scored
-single device Multiplayer support
-hosting and joining a Local Multiplayer (LAN) game

*online multiplayer will be updated in the future
